1403470.name: SPACE / MECH / PILOT Soundtrack
1403470.description:
Listen to the emotional soundscapes from the idle-RPG of the cosmos with SPACE / MECH / PILOT - ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK!

Composed by Tanner "Ruky" Crank (A NIGHTMARE'S TRIP, Garden for Gato, RE: DECEIVED VOICE), this exciting 5+1-track OST is set to inspire...and dazzle (in a good way). As a bonus, you'll also receive the track "Dreams & Flashbacks", which went unused in the final game!

Available to download in MP3 / WAV format.
